subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=61|rad=心|as=08|sn=11|four=|canj=PLE|ids=⿰[[忄]][[隶]]}}

# [[indulgent]] and [[without]] [[restraint]], to [[abandon]] [[oneself]] to [[carnal]] [[desire]]
# to [[be]] [[dissolute]], to be [[debauched]]
# to [[forget]], [[slow]]
# to [[delay]]
